title: Track a Building Permit Application
description: A citizen calls to check the status of their building permit application. An operator must look it up and provide an update.

tasks.description: Retrieve the permit application using the citizen's provided application number or address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the correct permit application.

tasks.description: Identify the current status of the application, which is 'Pending Review by Engineering Dept'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the application's stage in the workflow.

tasks.description: Inform the citizen of the current status and the estimated time for the next update.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the status and next steps to the citizen.
